* Reads a file's contents into the current session's task list; Returns 0 on success,
* 1 on failure and 2 on partial failure.

* 2 if the file could be read but all tasks could not be read successfully
* Creates a task from a String containing the relevant information. Used to load tasks

* Parent exception class for all command exceptions. Not to be thrown directly.
* Please throw one of the subclasses!
* Creates an exception with the violating command and argument, with the command usage
* @param command The command that caused the exception to be raised
* @param usage The usage of the command
* Thrown when an invalid index is input to the program.
* Creates an exception with the violating command and argument, with the command usage
* @param argument The argument that caused the exception to be raised
* @param command The command that caused the exception to be raised
* @param usage The usage of the command
public DukeCommandInvalidIndexException(String argument, String command, String usage) {
* Returns the error message to be printed to the user.
return argument + " is an invalid option for " + command + "!\n"
* Thrown when a command has missing arguments.

* Returns the error message to be printed to the user
return "I don't know what " + command + " is!";
